description: This file defines a centralized routing configuration for a Flutter app, including route constants, route setup, argument classes for navigation, and placeholder widgets for screens.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A typed, centralized route registry managing named routes and route generation logic for core screens such as home, search, favorites, and recipe detail.

classes.name: RecipeDetailArgs
classes.description: A class encapsulating arguments for navigating to the recipe detail screen, allowing either a recipe ID or a Recipe object.

classes.name: _DetailPlaceholder
classes.description: A placeholder widget representing the recipe detail screen during development.

classes.name: _InvalidArgsPlaceholder
classes.description: A widget displayed when invalid or missing arguments are provided for the recipe detail route.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Returns a map of route names to widget builder functions for core screens.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Generates a route dynamically, handling the '/detail' route with typed arguments and providing error handling for invalid arguments.
